snippet: The Detroit Lions exposed Philadelphia’s problems, which span from a defense failing to pressure the quarterback to an offense struggling with turnovers.
abstract: Detroit Lions defeat Philadelphia Eagles, 26-23, in overtime.
lead_paragraph: The Detroit Lions exposed Philadelphia’s problems, which span from a defense failing to pressure the quarterback to an offense struggling with turnovers.

headline.seo: Eagles’ Loss to Lions Adds to Run of Struggles and Doubts
headline.main: Eagles’ Loss Adds to Run of Struggles and Doubts
headline.print_headline: Eagles’ Loss Adds to Run Of Struggles and Doubts
